sn26.1:1.2: “Monks, the arising, continuation, rebirth, and manifestation of the seer is the arising of suffering, the continuation of diseases, and the manifestation of old age and death.
sn26.1:1.3: The arising, continuation, rebirth, and manifestation of the hearer,
sn26.1:1.7: and thinker is the arising of suffering, the continuation of diseases, and the manifestation of old age and death.
sn26.1:1.8: The cessation, settling, and ending of the seer is the cessation of suffering, the settling of diseases, and the ending of old age and death.
sn26.1:1.9: The cessation, settling, and ending of the hearer,
sn26.1:1.13: and thinker is the cessation of suffering, the settling of diseases, and the ending of old age and death.”
